dialogue.speaker: Protagonist
dialogue.text: Welcome to the land of Eldoria, a mystical realm of wonder and magic.

dialogue.speaker: Mysterious Stranger
dialogue.text: Greetings, young adventurer. I sense that you are not from around here. What brings you to our land?

dialogue.speaker: Protagonist
dialogue.text: I'm just a curious traveler, seeking fortune and glory in these untamed lands.

dialogue.speaker: Mysterious Stranger
dialogue.text: Fortune and glory, you say? Very well. I can help you on your journey... for a price.
